text.section: A state Court-Appointed Special Advocate Association shall be established. All CASA volunteers, local board members, program directors, and staff shall be eligible for membership in the association. Other categories of membership may be created by the association.

The association shall meet annually to elect a board of directors to manage the business of the association. The board shall, annually, elect a president, a vice president, a secretary, and a treasurer. The board shall meet at least four (4) times a year, and meetings may be held more frequently when called by the president of the board or by a majority of the board members.

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 245, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 264, sec. 7, effective July 13, 1990.
